question: How many permanent Lok Adalats are there in Odisha?
explanation: There are 13 permanent Lok Adalats are there in Odisha- Cuttack, Ganjam, Dhenkanal, Sambalpur, Balasore, Sundargarh, Balangir, Mayurbhanj at Baripada, Koraput at Jeypore, Keonjhar, Puri, Bhawanipatna at Kalahandi and Bhubaneswar.
